str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To journey with, accompany. From sun and hodeuo; to travel in company with.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Dumb, speechless (as with amazement). From enneuo; dumb, i.e. Silent from astonishment.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).
